name: Balloon Story
description:
Only controls are mouse positioning and clicking. Propel your balloon through the increasingly convoluted obstacles and even face off against the sun in your journey through this, hmm, dungeon in the sky.

Not only is this game restricted to a 64x64 resolution, but also a palette of 10 colors.

The HTML build may run slowly, which could make it more approachable. Download one of the other builds for a buttery-smooth 60fps and the dev-intended experience.
